SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BattleshipController
Controller class for the Battleship game, responsible for initializing and coordinating various components like menus, chat, game logic, and ship placement.
BattleshipModel
The BattleshipModel class represents the game model for Battleship.
BattleshipView
The BattleshipView class represents the main frame of the Battleship game.
ChatController
The ChatController class handles chat functionality for the Battleship game.
CoordinateModel
Represents a coordinate in a two-dimensional space.
FontLoader
The FontLoader class provides utility methods for loading fonts from file paths.
GameController
The GameController class manages the game logic for Battleship.
LocalizationLoader
The LocalizationLoader class manages the localization of messages for different languages.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the Battleship game application.
MenuController
The MenuController class handles the menu options for the Battleship game.
ServerController
The ServerController class handles the server-side and client-side networking for the Battleship game.
ServerController.MessageType
Enum to define the types of messages that can be sent between the client and server.
ShipController
The ShipController class handles ship placement and interaction on the Battleship grid.
ShipModel
Represents a ship in the Battleship game.
SplashScreenView
The SplashScreenView class represents the splash screen that appears before launching the main Battleship program.
